prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Book language is a human-understandable markup language for creating AI applications such as chatbots, knowledge bases, agents, and automations. It is based on markdown and designed to be easily readable by both humans and machines.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}

promptResult.content: Book language, human-understandable, markup language, AI applications, chatbots, knowledge bases, agents, automations, markdown, readable, humans, machines
